participant_1.background:
I am moving to a new city because my family is relocating.
i m dissatisfied with the school life i ve had so far.
I eat fruits like apples and bananas for their natural sweetness.
i have always wanted to travel to ireland or puerto rico.
The weather doesn't matter to me as long as I can go shopping and listen to rock music.

participant_2.background:
I like to read fiction to escape from the criticism of my family.
i love romantic comedies.
i have 10 years experience in our industry , yet she gets promoted.
I bought a bouquet of daisies for my wife on our anniversary.
I enjoy a variety of foods, but my favorite is probably chocolate.

content.text: Hey there! I'm moving to a new city because of my family's relocation. I've always wanted to travel to Ireland or Puerto Rico.
Oh that sounds exciting! I love to travel too, but I've never been out of the country. I'm sure you'll have a great time.
Thanks! I hope so too. I've always wanted to go somewhere tropical. I've been reading a lot of romance novels lately, they're so relaxing.
I love romance novels too! They're a great way to escape from the world. I'm currently reading one about a woman who falls in love with her boss.
That sounds interesting! I love those kinds of stories. I'm currently reading one about a woman who travels to Ireland to find her true love.
Oh that sounds like a good one! I'm sure you'll enjoy it.
Thanks! I hope so too. I'm also really into shopping and listening to rock music.
I love rock music too! What are some of your favorite bands?
I love a lot of different bands, but my favorites are probably Guns N' Roses, Metallica, and AC/DC.
Oh those are some great bands! I love Guns N' Roses too.
Me too! They're my favorite band of all time.
I can see why! They're so good.
Yeah, they're amazing. I'm also really into shopping.
Me too! I love going to the mall and finding new clothes.
Me too! I love trying on new clothes and seeing how they look on me.
Me too! I always have so much fun shopping.
